abstract: As Wall Street eagerly awaits signs that Facebook will offer shares to the public, the venture capitalists that prowl Silicon Valley are keeping close tabs on another hot commodity: the employees leaving Facebook, Reuters writes.
snippet: As Wall Street eagerly awaits signs that Facebook will offer shares to the public, the venture capitalists that prowl Silicon Valley are keeping close tabs on another hot commodity: the employees leaving Facebook, Reuters writes.
lead_paragraph: As Wall Street eagerly awaits signs that  Facebook will offer shares to the public, the venture capitalists that prowl Silicon Valley are keeping close tabs on another hot commodity: the employees leaving Facebook, Reuters writes.

headline.main: Facebook Veterans in Venture Capital Spotlight
